title: Taking Ownership of our Expertise
description: Taking Ownership of our Expertise is about demystifying Impostor Syndrome and tips to step up & own our expertise!.

title: The Art of Storytelling with Data Science
description: In a rapidly expanding field like data science, with data everywhere, it’s easy to merely focus on technical skills: coding, data types, algorithms. It’s quintessential to make data consumable for the business, explore promising tools and skills towards creating human-centered data science and speculate future directions for data analytics and visualizations. This talk will throw light on how data helps businesses solve problems worth millions and have tangible outcomes, roadmap to visualizations and best practices of storytelling with data!

title: Learn to Write, Write to Learn
description: Every engineer is also a writer, but you don't need to be an engineer to write. The workshop aims to guide and demystify some common misconceptions around content writing. Learn whom to write for and what to write for them by understanding what your audience might like to read. More importantly, this is a motivation to conquer the writer's block. Also its not just about writing, you will also gain some tips on how you can turn writing into a career.

title: Learn To Write, Write To Learn

title: Enhance your Core Web Vitals with AMP
description: This talk covers the unified guidance for quality signals & the metrics that are essential to delivering a great user experience on the web and helps the developer in making performant solutions for the users. It will also throw some light on the best practices and performance with Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP).
